text: Thurman Donell Rodgers (December 1, 1934 â€“ June 9, 2022) was a lieutenant general in the United States Army. From March 1979 to April 1981, Rodgers served as commanding officer of the 7th Signal Brigade. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Tennessee
